rataka aadayama pawathinne badu mudal haraha gewana badu anuwa ,naya hatiyata ganna wu aadhara anuwayi.api purudu wela thiyenne naya aadhara ganna.biliyana daha dahaka withara nayak ekka thamayi apita 2015 janawari 08 wanida rata bhara ganna wune.thamunnanselage sini atayata parippu atayata witharan badu gahapu yugayak thibuna.ada nidahas adhyapanayen igena gaththa aya ihalata gihilla badu gewanna kiyapuwama badu gewanna baha kiyala udghoshanaya karanawa me rajaya udghoshanawalata baya rajayak nemeyi.

1824 di rahas hamudawak yatath wijitha soldaduwanta prahara ella kalaha.1830 saha 1840 andaman dupath walata godabasinalada nawu muhudubathwiya mema nawiyanta andaman aadiwasin wisin paharadi owun ge mansha aadiwasin anubhawa karaathi bawa pawase. 1844 di brithanyayata ayath magi prawahana ha bhanda prawahana nawak andaman dupath asala di kunatuwakata hasuwi muhudubath wiya.me athara yatath wijitha hamudawanta nawathath praharayak ella kirimata adiwasinta hakiwiya.[9]
